caption.p: Projected May-June C. finmarchicus density over different time periods and climate scenarios. ( a) Model hindcast under RCP 8.5. ( b) Samples taken from 1977–2013. ( c) Mean 2041–2060 density under RCP 4.5 and ( d) RCP 8.5. ( e) Mean 2081–2100 density under RCP 4.5 and ( f) RCP 8.5. Figure was created by the first author in MATLAB v2015b (https://www.mathworks.com/products/matlab.html) using the package ‘M_Map’ v1.4 h (https://www.eoas.ubc.ca/~rich/map.html).
